sentences.english: First it was India's Tata Motors ( TTM) that bought Jaguar and Land Rover from Ford ( F) last year.
sentences.chinese: 早先是去年印度的塔塔汽車從福特買下了捷豹和路虎。

sentences.english: Earlier on we had the incredible hulk dog, Wendy the Whippet.
sentences.chinese: 早先，我們見識了難以置信的巨型狗小靈狗溫迪。

sentences.english: I hope this is the first of mexcellentygarees with the teare.
sentences.chinese: 我盼望這是我跟隨隊伍插手角逐的早先。

sentences.english: As I mentioned earlier, all of these ideas are up for debate.
sentences.chinese: 就像我早先提到的，這些想法都要進行討論。

sentences.english: He used to be a long-term labourer for a landlord.
sentences.chinese: 他早先給地主扛過長活。

sentences.english: The analysis would help us on the carnivalization phenom of net literature and the colour of folklore.
sentences.chinese: 這種狂歡意識與早先的民間文學有很大的相似性。

sentences.english: She's got much more product from an earlier episode than she did when all in black.
sentences.chinese: 比起現在的一身黑，早先時候她的裝扮要華麗得多。

sentences.english: The theatre's raffish auditorium recalls an earlier era.
sentences.chinese: 劇院俗麗的觀衆席讓人想起早先的時代。

sentences.english: Early reports say the town of Nahrin had been nearly destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 早先的報導說納赫林鎮幾乎被摧毀。

sentences.english: The woman showed them to the table he'd reserved.
sentences.chinese: 這位女服務員帶他們到了戴爾早先預訂的桌子旁。

sentences.english: That these breakages occurred after death is among the considerable evidence that casts doubt on the early disaster theory.
sentences.chinese: 這些死後才發生的骨折，令人懷疑早先的災難理論。

sentences.english: We beat them 5-1 in our previous match this season.
sentences.chinese: 我們在本賽季的早先一場比賽中5比1大勝過他們。

sentences.english: They may have anticipated Columbus in the discovery of America.
sentences.chinese: 他們可能比哥侖布早先發現美洲。

sentences.english: She has previously described their relationship as 'like brother and sister'.
sentences.chinese: 艾瑪早先表示她和丹尼爾是“兄妹情”。

sentences.english: A London newspaper earlier said that Ms. Blair had caught the virus and was recovering.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦有報紙早先稱，切麗已經患病並仍在康復之中。

sentences.english: the vinegar had been stored in barrels that previously contained antifreeze.
sentences.chinese: 食醋儲存在早先盛過抗凍劑的大桶裏。

definition: to expect/to presume/to think (sth is likely)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
